name: Meryem
text: Are you ready to try and save the World
Responses: No... I want to go back to bed.

name: Meryem
text: Great! Today we are going to Asia!

name: Meryem
text: You should try and find Ian, he will tell you what you can do.

name: Meryem
text: Don't forget to talk to the locals first, the might know either where he is or what you should do.

name: Meryem
text: Welp, off you go! interact with the play button to get to Asia.

name: Meryem
text: Well, you don't really have a choice do you.

name: Meryem
text: So today we are going to Asia.

name: Meryem
text: You should try and find Ian, he will tell you what you can do.

name: Meryem
text: Don't forget to talk to the locals first, they might know either where he is or what you should do.

name: Meryem
text: Go on then, and remember, I am always watching you
